description: CDU leader Annegret Kramp-Karrenbauer surprises her party by saying she no longer wants to lead it.
title: Annegret Kramp-Karrenbauer: Favourite to replace Merkel stands down
title_page: Annegret Kramp-Karrenbauer: Favourite to replace Merkel stands down - BBC News
maintext: The episode has dashed Chancellor Merkel's hopes of a smooth transition of power when she steps down next year. Attention is turning to the handful of men jostling to succeed her - at least three of whom would likely steer the CDU to the right-of-centre.
